title: Hunting the President: Threats, Plots and Assassination Attempts, Part 3: Ronald Reagan
description: After his presidency, a deranged man broke into Ronald Reagan’s California home and attempted to strangle the former president before he was subdued by Secret Service agents. This attempt on his life came on the heels on many other attempts on Reagan, the final president to serve his entire presidency during the Cold War.
itunes:author: Scott Rank, PhD
